about.subtitle: About Us
about.title: Success Story in Construction & Industry
about.paragraph1: Ardmir Shpk is a multifunctional business with extensive experience in various fields including construction, international trade, mining and material production, as well as industrial services.
about.paragraph2: Since its foundation, we have completed important projects throughout the country, bringing high standards of quality, innovation and reliability to every aspect of our work.

import.title: Import & Export / Trade
import.description: Import and export of goods, including transportation equipment (excavators, spare parts, etc.), and retail trade of machinery components, oils, and greases.

construction.title: Construction & Infrastructure
construction.description: Implementation of construction projects such as earthworks, masonry, reinforced concrete, blasting, and system installations; road construction, asphalt paving, and installation of concrete plants.

mining.title: Mining & Material Production
mining.description: Utilization of quartz and granite stones, operation of quarries and mines, production of inert materials and concrete in various quantities, and establishment of concrete plants.

machinery.title: Heavy Machinery & Industrial Services
machinery.description: Sale and leasing of construction vehicles (trucks, concrete mixers, concrete pumps, demolition hammers), installation and dismantling services for industrial equipment.

additional.title: Additional Services
additional.description: Green area maintenance, maritime constructions, deep port works, wood and metal production, road transport of construction aggregates and various goods.

agriculture.title: Agricultural Products
agriculture.description: Collection, packaging and export of agricultural products (fruits and vegetables) for domestic and international markets, ensuring product quality and freshness.
